title: Women's duties in fedual Japan and Europe

content.question: The responsibilities of aristocratic women in both feudal Japan and medieval Europe usually included

choices.label: representing their families in courts of law
training their sons to be warriors

topic.text: 1.7: Comparison in the Period from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
